newsitem.title: KENYA: Nairobi bourse shares ease, market subdued.
newsitem.headline: Nairobi bourse shares ease, market subdued.

text.p: Index-linked shares on the Nairobi Stock Exchange eased marginally in subdued sentiment, according to bourse officials.
The index shed 20.31 points to close at 3439.08.
Turnover was posted at 49.8 million shillings traded on 2,940,005 shares compared to 17.8 million shillings on 568,112 shares on Tuesday.
Lonrho Motors was down 9.50 to close at 58.50 while Diamond Trust Kenya eased a shilling to close at 30.
Meanwhile foreign demand for Kenya Commercial Bank maintained the share at a steady price of 102 unchanged.
"Foreign funds seem to have revived Kenya Commercial Bank," a broker said.
They also bought Kenya Airways at 9.50 from 8.30 and Firestone East Africa at 29 from 28.
Power share Kenya Power & Lighting moved up to close at 170 from 162 while Unga Group closed at 141 from 130.
